trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGLA303_04984_SEQ_00<tab>The customers have spoken, and Xeerol Ja can't wait to tell you all about it.

TEXT_KINGLA303_04984_SEQ_01<tab>Xeerol Ja has tasked you with creating fermented aloe juice.
※Minimum collectability rating for this delivery is 210. Delivering items with a rating of 430 or more will earn greater rewards.
TEXT_KINGLA303_04984_SEQ_02<tab>You deliver the fermented aloe juice to Xeerol Ja. It seems you have time to hone your craft until you hear back from Halnaruk.
TEXT_KINGLA303_04984_TODO_00<tab>Deliver fermented aloe juice to Xeerol Ja.
TEXT_KINGLA303_04984_XEEROLJA_000_000<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. About your cherimoya juice...
TEXT_KINGLA303_04984_XEEROLJA_000_001<tab>Our customers can't get enough! What's more, all the fashionable Mamool Ja have taken to calling it “smoothscale juice”!
TEXT_KINGLA303_04984_XEEROLJA_000_002<tab>Frankly, I've had so many orders that I've grown completely indifferent towards handling cherimoya. As far as I'm concerned, it's a fruit like any other.
TEXT_KINGLA303_04984_XEEROLJA_000_003<tab>Now, I say we keep our momentum and move on to concocting our next prototype!
TEXT_KINGLA303_04984_XEEROLJA_000_004<tab>For this one, I'd like to address the health concerns of Moblins.

TEXT_KINGLA303_04984_XEEROLJA_100_004<tab>Among those who live in Tuliyollal, many work as gatherers, traveling long distances whilst bearing big, heavy packs. A drink that alleviates fatigue may do wonders for them.

TEXT_KINGLA303_04984_XEEROLJA_000_005<tab>The problem is, the Moblin palate is somewhat unfathomable to other people. Their favored rot-tea, for instance, smells like...well, not like something I would prefer to drink.

TEXT_KINGLA303_04984_XEEROLJA_000_006<tab>I worry that a similarly pungent beverage may result in the immediate cessation of business for Xeerol Ja Juicecraft. So instead, I'd like to try our luck with fermented aloe.
TEXT_KINGLA303_04984_XEEROLJA_000_007<tab>Its scent is striking, yet fruity, and I suspect it would satisfy the Moblins' preference for strong flavors without alienating the rest of my clientele.
TEXT_KINGLA303_04984_XEEROLJA_000_008<tab>All that remains is to add an ingredient fit for soothing sore muscles. That much I can leave to you, I hope?
TEXT_KINGLA303_04984_XEEROLJA_000_009<tab>Excellent! And, er...about Halnaruk.
TEXT_KINGLA303_04984_XEEROLJA_000_010<tab>I know I wasn't able to convince him last time, but his opinion as a Moblin is absolutely necessary for this drink.
TEXT_KINGLA303_04984_XEEROLJA_000_011<tab>We must make this juice so astringently aromatic that even <var 1A 02 /var>he'll<var 1A 01 /var> want a sip!
TEXT_KINGLA303_04984_XEEROLJA_000_012<tab>I'm glad I can count on you. Let's have some delicious fermented aloe juice waiting for Halnaruk once he gets back from his gathering!
TEXT_KINGLA303_04984_XEEROLJA_000_015<tab>We need a soothing refreshment fit for a Moblin. Particularly one enticing enough to elicit our friend's help!
TEXT_KINGLA303_04984_XEEROLJA_000_020<tab>That's fermented aloe if I've ever smelt it! I hope Moblins find it as refreshing as it is strong.
TEXT_KINGLA303_04984_XEEROLJA_000_021<tab>G-Goodness gracious, that is an overpowering scent! If this doesn't please our Moblin customers, I shudder to imagine what will...

TEXT_KINGLA303_04984_XEEROLJA_000_030<tab>This is a remarkable beverage. I applaud your addition of tomato─not only does it offer ample nutrition, but its flavors meet the fermented aloe upon the fine line of deliciousness and danger!
TEXT_KINGLA303_04984_XEEROLJA_100_030<tab>I'm sure our local Moblins will flock to this flavor, but will Halnaruk?
TEXT_KINGLA303_04984_HALNARUK_000_031<tab>Pfff...kohhh!? What incredible aroma is Halnaruk sniffcatching!?
TEXT_KINGLA303_04984_XEEROLJA_000_032<tab>Oh, this? Just a blend of fermented aloe juice that <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> was kind enough to make.

TEXT_KINGLA303_04984_XEEROLJA_000_033<tab>You've been working so hard gathering our cherimoya that I wanted to be sure our next drink was one that could alleviate your daily fatigue. Consider it a token of our appreciation!
TEXT_KINGLA303_04984_HALNARUK_000_034<tab>Appreciation? For...Halnaruk?

TEXT_KINGLA303_04984_XEEROLJA_000_035<tab><var 1A 02 /var>Boundless<var 1A 01 /var> appreciation─not just from us, but our customers, too. Our offerings may yet be limited, but if the three of us work together, we're sure to have the whole city singing praises of our juice, made possible only by your fastidious gathering!
TEXT_KINGLA303_04984_XEEROLJA_100_035<tab>To that end, I hope you will do me the honor of sharing your opinion on this one.
TEXT_KINGLA303_04984_HALNARUK_000_036<tab>Halnaruk will take juicymix for the homeroad. Propergood Mobbies never bareface in public.
TEXT_KINGLA303_04984_XEEROLJA_100_036<tab>How wonderful! I can't wait to hear what he thinks.
TEXT_KINGLA303_04984_HALNARUK_000_037<tab>Juicekeep is concerned about Mamool Ja skinpeels and now Mobbie painaches... Is juicekeep trying to become a juicedoctor?
TEXT_KINGLA303_04984_XEEROLJA_000_038<tab>A-A doctor? No...
TEXT_KINGLA303_04984_XEEROLJA_000_039<tab>I once hoped to become a chirurgeon, however.
TEXT_KINGLA303_04984_XEEROLJA_000_040<tab>Chirurgeons must be both expertly versed in the medicinal properties of flora and highly proficient in healing magicks.

TEXT_KINGLA303_04984_XEEROLJA_000_041<tab>We of the Boonewa clan are magically talented by nature, so my father was able to excel as a chirurgeon in this city. His diverse knowledge saved the lives of many.
TEXT_KINGLA303_04984_XEEROLJA_000_042<tab>As his daughter, I once dreamed of following in his footsteps...
TEXT_KINGLA303_04984_HALNARUK_000_043<tab>So juicekeep studied fruithealth and bodybreaks?

TEXT_KINGLA303_04984_XEEROLJA_000_044<tab>I do have some knowledge of nutrition and physiology, but it's of little consequence. I no longer have aspirations to become anything more than a mixer of juice.
TEXT_KINGLA303_04984_XEEROLJA_000_045<tab>Anyway, I look forward to hearing what you think of that one.
TEXT_KINGLA303_04984_HALNARUK_000_046<tab>Dribblydrool for the tastysmell is already filling up mobbiemask... Pfffkssshhhlurp...
TEXT_KINGLA303_04984_SYSTEM_000_047<tab>Xeerol Ja is delighted with your efforts. She now considers you a <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Moblin Motivator<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>!
TEXT_KINGLA303_04984_SYSTEM_000_050<tab>The next request will be available from Xeerol Ja upon reaching level 95 as an alchemist or culinarian.
TEXT_KINGLA303_04984_SYSTEM_000_051<tab>In order to undertake the subsequent quest, you must first complete the main scenario quest “Into the Traverse.”
